snippet: The $21 million effort against the disease will include expanded mosquito surveillance and testing services for pregnant women.
abstract: New York City announces plans to combat spread of Zika virus that include campaign to spread testing and prevention information, expansion of mosquito surveillance program and testing services for pregnant women and local mosquitoes.
lead_paragraph: The $21 million effort against the disease will include expanded mosquito surveillance and testing services for pregnant women.

headline.main: Zika Virus Campaign Planned by New York City
headline.print_headline: City Plans Drive Against Zika Virus
